title: Simplifying the Expression
text: First, simplify the expression by solving for the value under the square root.
speech: First, simplify the expression by solving for the value under the square root.
pacedSpeech: First, simplify the expression by solving for the value under the square root.

title: Square and Square Root of a Number
text: If $$n^2=m$$, then $$m$$ is the square of $$n$$. For example, $${10}^2=100$$, so $$100$$ is the square of $$10$$. Alternatively, $$\sqrt{100}=10$$.
speech: If  n squared is equal to m , then  m  is the square of  n . For example,  10 squared is equal to 100 , so  100  is the square of  10 . Alternatively,  the square root of 100 is equal to 10 .
pacedSpeech: If   n squared is equal to m
. For example,   10 squared is equal to 100
. Alternatively,   the square root of 100 is equal to 10
